name: Pieces
overview: If you're looking for a fun, family-style puzzle game that provides hours of brain-teasing action, then Pieces will thrill you to pieces! Both children and adults will find puzzles with the perfect level of difficulty. You can go it alone, or get up to five competitors to take a piece of the action on the puzzling playing field. Don't fall to pieces if you can't find a solution--there are plenty of helpful tricks and items to help along the way!
